fullText: Linda Vista is a funny, sad, smart and sprawling portrait of middle-aged male disappointment that feels both bracingly honest and somewhat indulgent.
dtliExcerpt: Linda Vista is a funny, sad, smart and sprawling portrait of middle-aged male disappointment that feels both bracingly honest and somewhat indulgent.
